name: Legend of Lua Touch
description:
Android version with touch support of Legend of Lua 0.0.9 by Challacade.

https://challacade.itch.io/legend-of-lua

Touch controls:

A: Main action

B: Side action

D: Dodge

F: Spell

C: Bow

S: Swap loadout

-: Pause menu

Press anywhere on the left side of the screen to spawn a joystick.
